analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders an inline SVG icon representing a "delay" status. It exposes a "fill" prop to control the SVG path color.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable, customizable icon for "delay" order status in the orders module of the application.

Components.name: IconStatusDelay
Components.role: Primary and only component in this file. Responsible for rendering the SVG graphic and accepting a fill color via props.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and type-check the props accepted by the component.

fill.description: Color used to fill the SVG path. Defaults to a CSS variable for black.

analysis.Usage:
Import the component where an "order delay" icon is needed, e.g.:

  import IconStatusDelay from 'modules/orders/components/icons/IconStatusDelay.vue'

Then use it in the template:

  <IconStatusDelay fill="#FF0000"/>
Notes: No <style> section â€” styling is driven entirely by the SVG and its "fill" prop.
Uses Vue 3 <script setup> syntax for concise component definition.
The SVG is inline, so no external asset loading is required.
Default fill uses a CSS custom property (--black), ensuring theme consistency.
